    Please review the below JD for Data Architect role in Troy, MI. Please let me know if you are interested.

    Job Title: Data Modeler/ Data Architect

    Location: Troy, MI

    Job Type: Full Time

    Job Description:
    Minimum of 10 years' experience as a Data modeler / Data Architect using Data Modeling tools like IBM's Information Data Architect (IDA - preferred) or ERWIN, etc.
    Minimum 5 years' experience as a Data modeler / Data architect in Data-warehousing & Data mart implementations
    Strong hands on experience with design of Dimensional modeling using Star / Snowflake with implementation experiences using slowly changing dimensions and understanding requirements of reporting & ETL
    Strong hands on experience with design of third normal form with implementation experiences using slowly changing dimensions
    Strong hands on experience with design of ODS (Operational Data sources)
    Strong understanding of ETL especially Datastage
    Strong hands on experience with Oracle
    Strong understanding of Cognos and Business Intelligence tools
    Strong understanding of Data Governance in a typical Data-warehouse
    Strong analytical skills with exceptional communication
    Experience in Banking and Mortgage domains preferred

    Job Type: Full-time

    Experience:
    Oracle: 1 year (Preferred)
    Data Warehouse: 1 year (Preferred)
    Design: 1 year (Preferred)
    Business Intelligence: 1 year (Preferred)
